page.title: 04Housing. Kimberworth Park.
page.content: Kimberworth Park;Rotherham. The houses have tall chimneys and very long roofs. There are four detached houses to make a block. On the chimneys are T.V. aerials and two chimney pots. The roof tiles are a reddish colour. The glass in the windows have lead in them. They open in and out. There are two doors in the middle of the block and between them is a passage way which leads to the back garden. Underneath the windows is a windowsill which is painted white. On the front of the block there are wires on the wall.
